name: Escape Them (Shivanshu Kushwaha)
description:
Car Go vrumm vrumm around the planet but beware of the meteors !

 

Escape them is a 3D game and you are a heroic driver driving around the green planet. If you are a hardcore gamer see yourself how far you can go ! Don't forget to check global Leaderboard

Comment down all the updates you want in upcoming versions of "Escape Them"
